TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISelectionItemProvider

summary.span: 公开一些方法和属性，UI 自动化客户端可通过这些方法和属性访问实现 的容器的各个可选择的子控件。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to individual, selectable child controls of containers that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在必须支持控件模式的 UI 自动化提供程序上实现 。Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the control pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddToSelection() cil managed

summary.span: 将当前元素添加到所选项的集合。

span.span: Adds the current element to the collection of selected items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果对的调用的结果 是选择了单个项，则 为该元素发送; 否则发送 或 适当的。If the result of a call to is that a single item is selected, then send an for that element; otherwise send an or as appropriate. > [!NOTE] > 此规则并不取决于容器是允许单个选择，还是允许使用哪种方法来更改选择。This rule does not depend on whether the container allows single or multiple selections, or on what method was used to change the selection. 只有结果是重要的。Only the result matters. ## Examples 下面的示例代码将项添加到选定项的集合。The following example code adds the item to a collection of selected items. [!code-csharp[UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip#AddToSelection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs#addtoselection)] [!code-vb[UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip#AddToSelection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/visualbasic/listitemfragment.vb#addtoselection)] [!code-csharp[UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip#IsSelected](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs#isselected)] [!code-vb[UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip#IsSelected](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/visualbasic/listitemfragment.vb#isselected)]

summary.span: 从所选项的集合删除当前元素。

span.span: Removes the current element from the collection of selected items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据需要发送。Send an as appropriate. > [!NOTE] > 此规则并不取决于容器是允许单个选择，还是允许使用哪种方法来更改选择。This rule does not depend on whether the container allows single or multiple selections, or on what method was used to change the selection. 只有结果是重要的。Only the result matters. ## Examples 下面的示例代码从选定项的集合中移除该项。The following example code removes the item from a collection of selected items.
